item.title: My brother, that's a whole T-bone. There are char marks on that thing. That doesn't look like a dog chew, that looks like someone ordered a very nice steak, ate it with their bare hands, then left the bone when their luggage arrived. Oklahoma is not a rea

item.title: This was the first major evidence for DNA being genetic material, but it wasn't the last. In the 50's scientists tagged DNA in viruses with radioactive isotopes to literally watch it transfer into host cells. How wild is that?! #science #biology #DNA #exp
item.description: This was the first major evidence for DNA being genetic material, but it wasn't the last. In the 50's scientists tagged DNA in viruses with radioactive isotopes to literally watch it transfer into host cells. How wild is that?! #science #biology #DNA #exp
